channel.title: Portfolio on Yongcheng website
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Yongcheng website

item.title: Change several pages from .Net to PHP (Symfony 3)
item.description: This project is for changing the existing pages from using .Net to PHP (Symfony 3). We chose to use Symfony framework because it is a robust and mature PHP framework. It has been around since 2005 and has a strong developer community and ecosystem supporting it. So we can rely on Symfony for long-term projects without worring about its future or support.
